welcome.welcome_description: track, Scan, and find the right dosage for you

onboarding.sub_title1: Don't miss a dose again. Get accurate and direct alerts for your medication times and stay up-to-date with your health schedule.
onboarding.sub_title2: Join studies or register your health attendance easily. Just scan the QR code and you'll be ready to go in seconds.
onboarding.sub_title3: Understand your health more deeply. Receive personalized tips and statistics based on your data and daily progress.
